name: All Three Played There Online Quiz | UK | 10 Questions

questions.text: Jason McAteer, Stig Inge Bjornebye, and Michael Thomas: for which of these clubs have these three played?

Noel Whelan, David Hopkin, and Rod Wallace have played for which one of these clubs?
Carlton Palmer, Efan Ekoku, and Dan Petrescu have played for which one of these clubs?
Stuart Ripley, Paul Merson, and Gary Walsh have all played for which club?
At which of these clubs have John Hartson, Slavan Bilic, and David Unsworth played?
These three players: Paul Kitson, Gary McAllister, and Jamie Lawrence, have played at which one of these clubs?
Chris Sutton, Tim Sherwood, and Andy Townsend: have played at which one of these clubs?
Ashley Ward, Darren Peacock, and Alan Wright: have played at which one of these clubs?
John Scales, Mark Walters, and Marcus Stewart: have all played at which club?
